text: Oh no! That sound!
I'm too late again!
I'm so sorry, Grace!
I'm sorry I didn't make it in time...
Again{SPEED=0.1}...
Human boy, I do not have much time left, so listen to me very carefully!
I am Ylarus, God of Time.
Adan has been destroyed once again.
Every time the wizard sacrifices the human girl you call Grace, Adan ignites, consuming all life, with yourself and the wizard included.
Human boy, you must stop this wizard!
I chose you because of the bond you share with the human girl.
I have rewound time for you before, but my powers are weakening.
Now, I lack the strength to do so again.
Thus, I have infused a fraction of my essence into this crystal.
With this crystal, you can {COLOR=BLUE}revert time by 12 hours before the catastrophe, as many times as necessary.
Take the crystal now! And use it!
{SPEED=0.5}My time is up...
{SPEED=0.3}For possible answers... about this catastrophe...
{SPEED=0.3}seek the {COLOR=BLUE}priest of {SPEED=0.1}Lastdenn{COLOR=BLACK}...
What the...
This is heavy.
Ylarus, the God of Time...
The time is now 07:30, so if I'm correct, Grace will die, and Adan will burn in approximately 12 hours, meaning around 19:30 tonight.
It appears Ylarus won't be divine intervening further, leaving me to rely on this crystal before time runs out.
With this newfound ability to revert time, I hope I'm now able to rescue Grace and, thereby, save the world?
This is a lot to take in.
Ylarus also mentioned something about the priest of Lastdenn...?
